name: mikroe.click.ipsdisplay
short_description: IPS Display Click is a compact add-on board that displays high-resolution graphics in embedded applications. This board features the ER-TFT1.14-2, a 1.14inch TFT LCD display from BuyDisplay, part of EastRising Technology, and utilizes the ST7789V controller for 262K color output. The display offers a 135x240 pixel resolution, operates through a 3-wire SPI interface, and includes additional control lines such as RST and RS for precise display management. Its small form factor and high-resolution output make it suitable for various projects, including handheld devices, smart displays, and control panels requiring clear visual output.
